ABOUT.NAME: Bastien Record
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
I am currently in my third year at the IUT of Blagnac, where I am specializing in web and software development. My professional goal is to become a developer, with a particular passion for innovative technologies and creating interactive tools.

Outside of IT, sports play an important role in my life. I played basketball for 9 years and had the opportunity to share my passion as a coach for 2 years. After a sports injury, I had to stop playing basketball, but I found another way to stay active by focusing on physical training. This practice helps me maintain a balance between my physical and mental well-being while pursuing my professional goals.
